original_title: NPP wins in Hewaheta, Bulathsinhala, Matugama and Horowpothana
original_body_lines: National People’s Power (NPP) has secured victories in the Hewaheta polling division in the Kandy District, Horowpothana polling division in Anuradhapura District, Bulathsinhala and Matugama polling divisions in Kalutara District.
